Love Tap.name: Love Tap
Love Tap.blurb: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.
Love Tap.description: Innate: Miss Fortune's next basic attack against an enemy unit ( turrets included), that was not the target of her previous basic attack, will deal 50% − 100% (based on level) AD  bonus physical damage, halved to 25% − 50% (based on level) AD versus minions.
Love Tap.notes:
* With  Runaan's Hurricane Love Tap only applies to the target affected by Miss Fortune's primary basic attack.
 The bonus damage applies  life steal.

Double Up.name: Double Up
Double Up.blurb: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
Double Up.description: Active: Miss Fortune fires a shot at a target enemy that deals physical damage, which then bounces to hit another unit behind it. The shot applies on-hit effects, including  Love Tap.
Double Up.description2: Double Up's bounce prioritizes units directly behind the primary target.
Double Up.description3: Double Up's bounce is affected by  critical strike modifiers. If Double Up kills its primary target, the bounce will critically strike.
Double Up.notes:
*  Spell shields can be used by either target. A  spell shield on the primary target will not prevent the shot from bouncing.
 The second shot follows a priority order on targets within 500 units of the primary one:
 Enemy or neutral units within a 20° cone.
 Enemy or neutral units within a 40° cone.
 Enemy or neutral units within a 110° cone.
 Enemy or neutral units within 150 units in a 160° cone.

 Double Up's cast range adjusts based on Miss Fortune's attack range.
 Double Up can bounce to units in brush or in fog of war if they are in range of the primary target.
 The damage of a  critically striking second shot is 40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 (+ 200% AD) (+ 70% AP) physical damage.

Strut.name: Strut
Strut.blurb: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
Strut.description: Passive - Strut: Miss Fortune gains  25 bonus movement speed if she has not taken damage in the last 5 seconds, excluding damage over time. This bonus is increased to a greater amount after another 5 seconds.
Strut.description2: Active - Guns Blazing: Miss Fortune gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and brings Strut's passive effect to full power.
Strut.description3: Marking a new target with  Love Tap reduces Strut's  cooldown by 2 seconds.

Make It Rain.name: Make It Rain
Make It Rain.blurb: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
Make It Rain.description: Active: Miss Fortune rains down hundreds of bullets onto the target area for 2 seconds,  slowing and dealing  magic damage every 0.25 seconds to units within the area.
Make It Rain.notes:
* Make It Rain grants  sight of its area of effect.
 Make It Rain remains active for its duration even if Miss Fortune dies.

Bullet Time.name: Bullet Time
Bullet Time.blurb: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
Bullet Time.description: Active: Miss Fortune channels for 3 seconds while firing several waves of bullets in a cone towards the target location, with each wave dealing 75% AD (+ 20% AP) physical damage.
Bullet Time.description2: Each wave can  critically strike, dealing (20% +  5%) bonus physical damage.
Bullet Time.notes:
* Bullet Time fires a wave of bullets each 0.25 / 0.2308 / 0.2143 / 0.2 / 0.1875 seconds.
 The damage dealt by each wave of Bullet Time is calculated when the wave reaches the target.
